name: Final Defenders
description:
Your planet is under attack! You and up to 3 other friends must take control of a variety of turrets and defend your cities against the onslaught of the Five Worlds Legion; a consortium of aliens that want your idyllic homeworld of Anidran and all its resources. Protect the Headquarters! Weather the storm!

Controls:

Supports Keyboard and various controllers (XBox, Playstation, General USB).

Steer Turret: A and D, or Arrow Keys

Fire: Space or Z

AltFire: CTRL or X

Cycle Turret selection on spawn: [ and ]

Currently, the alpha demo is available for feedback, with the ability to play 4-player co-op battles over the city of Natolia, at your desired length and difficulty. There are 4 distinct turrets to pick from:

[Turret Alpha] - "The Lance" : this turret is slow firing, but the high power plasma bolt will punch through almost anything, cutting a swathe through the enemy battle-line.

[Turret Bravo] - "The Detonator" : use the secondary fire button to detonate the warheads this turret fires. Each explode in a powerful shock-wave that destroys most enemies with ease.

[Turret Charlie] - "The Flak" : rapid firing a stream of fairly fast flak shells, this turret is great at taking out numerous smaller foes.

[Turret Delta] - "The Defender" : a well-balanced turret firing powerful pulses at a steady rate, that can often penetrate enemy armour to hit other enemies behind them. 

 For full release, we're hoping to add a number of exciting features including a series of mission challenges and a "campaign" meta-game with linked battles and non-linear progress. There are also new enemies on the way; and some new turrets as well perhaps...
